column3: <us> 在掩体下从 <them> 身旁撤离.

Melee attack

Take cover

column3: 掩护 跳到地形提供的最佳掩护处。必须至少离所有敌人1格。如果隐藏，有被发现的机会。

Low chance of tripping on terrain.
Chance of being detected if hidden.

Hidden Retreat

Low chance of being detected if hidden.

Run!

Removes cover.
Makes you vulnerable.
High chance of tripping on terrain.
High chance of being detected if hidden.

column2:
Advance 
Moves 1 space closer to target.
Must see target.
Removes cover.
Chance of tripping on terrain.
Chance of being detected if hidden.

Retreat (Crawl)
Try to leave the battlefield, based on enemy numbers and proximities, movement rates, etc.
Must be out of all enemies' ranges.
Removes cover.
column3: 爬着撤离 根据敌人的数量和距离、移动速度等，尝试离开战场。必须在所有敌人的射程之外。移除掩护。
<us> 用无线电呼叫无人机火力支援!

column2:
Radio DMC Drone
Call in drone support fire.
column3: 呼叫底特律无人机 呼叫无人机给予火力支援。

column2:
Search 
Scan area for hidden targets.
Must not see target yet.
column3: 搜索 扫描区域寻找隐藏目标。必须还没有看到目标。

column2:
Vanish from Sight
Disappears from battle without being seen.
Must see target.
column3: 从视野中消失 从战斗中消失而不被发现。必须看到目标。

column2:
Exploit Weakness
Seeks a weakness to exploit in target, helping future attacks against it.
Must see target.
column3: 看出弱点 寻找目标的弱点，加强的你对他攻击效果。必须看到目标。

column2:
Intimidate
Explode with unbridled rage, scaring target.
Both you and target must see each other.
column3: 恐吓 爆发出不受控制的愤怒，恐吓目标。你和目标必须能互相看见。
<us> 把 <them> 引诱进了绝杀陷阱!

column2:
Lethal Trap
Leads target into a deadly situation, killing it.
Must be closer to target than 4 spaces.
Both you and target must see each other.
Rarely available.
column3: 致命陷阱 将目标带入必死之境，将其杀死。与目标的距离必须低于4格。你和目标必须能互相看见。罕见技能。
